import React, { useContext } from 'react' import '../../src/dist/css/output.css' import CrewSection from './CrewSection' import { DataContext } from '../Movies' export default function MovieMain() { const data = useContext(DataContext) return (

{data.data?.title}

IMDb

{data.data?.vote_average}

{data.data?.genres?.map(item => item.name + " " )}

{data.runtime} dakika

{data.data?.overview}

) }
